name: Golf Balls (Dozen)
description: Quality pre-owned golf balls in good condition. Mixed brands including Titleist, Callaway, and Srixon. Perfect for practice or casual rounds.

name: Hybrid Club
description: Versatile hybrid club suitable for various skill levels. Great alternative to long irons. Graphite shaft, regular flex.

name: Push Trolley
description: Three-wheel push trolley in good working condition. Folds flat for easy storage and transport. Includes scorecard holder.

name: Golf Glove (L)
description: New leather golf glove, size Large. Left hand (for right-handed golfers). Premium feel and grip.

name: Golf Polo Shirt
description: Breathable polyester golf polo in excellent condition. Various colours available. Please specify size when ordering.

name: 7 Iron
description: Individual 7 iron from a quality brand set. Steel shaft, standard lie. Good condition with plenty of life left.

name: Golf Bag
description: Stand bag with dual straps for comfortable carrying. Multiple pockets for storage. Minor wear but fully functional.

name: Putter
description: Blade-style putter with good feel. Standard length (34"). Clean face with original grip in decent condition.
